metadata.name: Automaton #1
metadata.description:
Dancer, Filmmaker, and Artist: Marco Alma 
Music : generated by Mubert (mubert.com/render)

2022
2048 x 2048
30p
length: 00:00:06

Video created by a style transfer AI process: 

I choreographed and performed the dance routines, subjected the footage to a style transfer AI process,  AI up-scaled it, color-graded manually every single frame, settled up the composition, completed it with grains and post-production overlays, and added the music generated with mubert.com.

The collector will get the original video file in 4K
